project.name: C-C124D-FFMP-05-ST03-DT02-DF08-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C124D-FFMP-05-ST03-DT02-DF08-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C124D-FFMP-05-ST03-DT02-DF08-CF18-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_7YIJisAdByDQZ2QBfXCt AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_sJa0bazURg OR segfault_code_pu0AeitfXv OR segfault_code_EPTi2MHczu OR segfault_code_d40Q8wqWvQ OR segfault_code_O0imGOcqMn OR segfault_msg_5PJl5OzyUi OR illegal_inst_msg_r7WJ6YZu3V) AND NOT timeout_xioqJWOheI) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_sJa0bazURg OR segfault_code_pu0AeitfXv OR segfault_code_EPTi2MHczu OR segfault_code_d40Q8wqWvQ OR segfault_code_O0imGOcqMn OR segfault_msg_5PJl5OzyUi OR illegal_inst_msg_r7WJ6YZu3V) OR timeout_xioqJWOheI OR controlled_exit_NqsMZKLZJM)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_sJa0bazURg OR segfault_code_pu0AeitfXv OR segfault_code_EPTi2MHczu OR segfault_code_d40Q8wqWvQ OR segfault_code_O0imGOcqMn OR segfault_msg_5PJl5OzyUi OR illegal_inst_msg_r7WJ6YZu3V) AND NOT timeout_xioqJWOheI) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_sJa0bazURg OR segfault_code_pu0AeitfXv OR segfault_code_EPTi2MHczu OR segfault_code_d40Q8wqWvQ OR segfault_code_O0imGOcqMn OR segfault_msg_5PJl5OzyUi OR illegal_inst_msg_r7WJ6YZu3V) OR timeout_xioqJWOheI OR controlled_exit_NqsMZKLZJM))
